name: Pictura
description:
Pictura is an atmospheric photography game where you explore new worlds, while working on your photo skills. Find the best shots and become a world famous photographer.

Explore your way through 2 world and 6 levels. From beautiful earthly settings to fantasy forests, you will encounter all kinds of creatures like rabbits, foxes, deer, butterflies, eagles, and many more!

On your adventure, you face puzzles, events, and you might find a few secrets along the way! Sell your picture to make a living and travel to new destinations.

But you don't have to go about it alone! You can choose a pet to accompany you throughout your adventure. Choose from anything from a friendly butterfly, to a tiny elephant, to household pets like a dog & cat, to more exotic pets such as cows, pigs, ducks, alpacas and many, many more!

Finally, when all is explored, you can create your own worlds using the Unity Engine our template. Share your creations with the community!

Features:
- 6 Stunning worlds to explore
- Interactive puzzles & events
- Over 15 unlockable pets to choose from
- Sell pictures to earn a living
- Collect all Secrets
- Create your own worlds and share with friends!

Join the discussion on Discord to provide feedback and try a tech demo!
